meanings.definition: The quality or state of being horrible.
meanings.sent1: The horribleness of the situation left everyone feeling scared.
meanings.sent2: The movie's horribleness made it difficult to watch.
meanings.sent3: The clown's costume added a touch of horribleness to the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The horribleness of the storm was like a dark cloud hanging over the town.
meanings.sent5: The horribleness of the haunted house was etched in everyone's memory.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something is horrible.
meanings.sent1: The horribleness of the smell in the room was unbearable.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't believe the horribleness of the news she had just heard.
meanings.sent3: The horribleness of the traffic made him wish he could teleport.
meanings.sent4: The horribleness of the mistake was like a weight on her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The horribleness of the crime scene was shocking to everyone.
